metadata.dc:author: Díaz Aguirregoitia, J
Gastaca Mateo, M A
Ortíz de Urbina López, J
Echevarría García-San Frechoso, A
Martínez Fernández, G
Campo Hiriart, M
metadata.dc:description: Duodenal metastases are a rare finding. Only 7% of these metastases are originated from a renal cell carcinoma and usually appear as a disseminated metastatic disease. The case of a patient with a duodenal metastasis from a renal cell carcinoma treated by duodenal resection, eight years after nephrectomy, is presented.
metadata.dc:title: Metástasis duodenal de adenocarcinoma de células renales.
[Duodenal metastasis of renal cell adenocarcinoma].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
